nodes.text: The Industrial Explorer Outfit was a specialized suit designed to be worn in hazardous areas. This suit was capable of withstanding the harsh conditions of industrial wastelands like the sewers of Coruscant and the enormous junkyards of Raxus Prime.
Galen Marek wore one such suit during his mission on Raxus Prime.

The Industrial Explorer Outfit (called Raxus Prime Survival Gear in the game) is featured in the The Force Unleashed video game. On the Imperial Raxus Prime level it was the default costume that players started with and could choose to play in later on in the game. The life support system has a distinctive look to the ones on the Rebel pilot outfit, and subtly incorporates elements from Darth Vader's life support suit.
